text: The night sky, with countless stars twinkling, as if to draw you in if you look up.

One by one, stars disappear from the pure macrocosmic view of the starry sky,
unobstructed by nothing.
A young man, alone in a chalk-white observatory built like a grand temple, looks up at that sky.
He holds a staff as tall as himself up to the sky and mutters to himself.

...Finally swallowed.
It's this star's turn, at last.

But, this signal emitted from the sky—is it a 'rainbow'?
It'll probably be the last chance.

...I need to inform the Royal Palace.
If the 'Hero' is coming, preparations to greet them are necessary.

The young man lowered his staff, then thrust it into the floor.
Then—
Like tree roots spreading, glowing lines ran across the ground, centered on the staff.
Watching that scene, the young man exhaled.

—Dear unseen 'Hero'.
Will you grace this world with your presence?
And...
Will you save this world?

—Planet Endaira,
Royal Capital of Start, Aradisia Kingdom, Northwest Central Continent.

The castle constantly launches fireworks.
The castle town, splendidly decorated, is bustling with more people than usual.

The capital has a festive atmosphere, fitting the description of "lively"...
But a little further out, in the suburbs.

In the desolate wasteland where a giant monster was once vanquished,
a temporary arena and spectator stands were set up, clearly makeshift at a glance—

In the arena, surrounded by packed spectator stands, were the knights of the Cavalry,
the Aradisia Kingdom's proud hero unit...

And heroes from various agencies,
waiting, already transformed.

name: Ryekie
text:
Wahahahaha!!
This is fun, a truly enjoyable event, Hopper!!!

name: Huckle
text:
Yeah, I guess so...
It must be a very enjoyable event for you.

Ryekie laughed heartily, seemingly very pleased,
while Huckle, in contrast, looked a little tired.

The two of them had just finished a few "warm-up matches"
and returned to [Player]'s side.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryekie
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh! [Player], thanks for the operation too!!
It was as easy to fight as ever!!!

options.text: You're in a good mood, Justice.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryekie
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, I feel great!
It's been a while since I've been able to fight on such a bright and festive stage!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh? Oh, I'm fine.
Sorry to make you worry.
My body's good, but it's the mental fatigue...

name: Ryekie
text:
What's wrong, Hopper!
It's the ultimate honor to fight at such a splendid festival!!
You should enjoy it too!!!

name: Huckle
text:
It's precisely because it's a celebration that I'm being careful.
After all, opponents I absolutely can't afford to have anything happen to,
are participating as a matter of course...

—As Huckle exhaled deeply,
a grand fanfare played from the speakers, followed by the announcer's voice echoing.

name: Announcer
text:
—To all our esteemed guests.
NeoTalents Production presents...

name: Announcer
text:
The Aradisia Kingdom's 500th Anniversary Celebration
'Super International Knights Martial Arts Tournament'!
Are you enjoying it?

name: Announcer
text:
Now, from His Majesty, King Alphecca Gemma XXI,
the current King of the Aradisia Kingdom and host of this tournament—

name: Announcer
text:
We would like to receive a renewed greeting.
All participating 'Knights' and audience members,
please rise.

The gazes of those who had been chatting lively
all turned at once towards the screen
at the front of the temporary stadium.

On a small stage set up in front of the screen,
a familiar figure ascended with extremely elegant movements.

name: Alphecca
text:
—To all the citizens who have gathered for this day.
To all at NeoTalents Production who offered to produce this tournament...

name: Alphecca
text:
And to all the heroes—no, the 'Knights'—
who have assembled from afar to our home country.
Allow me to express my gratitude once again.

name: Alphecca
text:
The reason our country has enjoyed such long-standing peace
is not only due to the abundance of resources, but also, I believe, o the tireless efforts of all our citizens.

options.text: Oh, His Majesty is actually acting like a proper ruler...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Shh... Listen quietly.
I know what you want to say, but you have to hold it in.

name: Alphecca
text:
—I have traveled to various countries and encountered many 'Knights'.
And then, I suddenly thought...

name: Alphecca
text:
I want to create a place where our country's Cavalry,
the cornerstone of our defense, and heroes from other countries and planets
can compete and grow together!

name: Alphecca
text:
Of course, this tournament is informal.
Do not hold back just because it is our country's festival;
I want you to fully showcase your abilities.

name: Alphecca
text:
...I, too, will wield my sword to my heart's content
in the events that follow.
Now, please enjoy yourselves.

name: Minister
text:
Y-Your Majesty!?
Wasn't the agreement that you would only participate in the warm-up matches?
This is different from what we discussed!

name: Alphecca
text:
Hehe. I've already stated it in a live broadcast across multiple planets,
so it's impossible to pretend it never happened now, isn't it?

name: Alphecca
text:
Besides, I am also a member of the Cavalry.
Even you have acknowledged that.
There's no reason for me not to participate.

name: Minister
text:
Th-That's...!
Your Majesty!
Please be fully aware of your position—

Alphecca descended from the stage after finishing his speech.
The conversation with the minister, who was probably waiting below the stage, aded away as they moved further from the microphone.

name: Announcer
text:
A-Ahem... that concludes
the words from His Majesty the King.

name: Announcer
text:
Next up is one of today's most anticipated matches!
A fierce battle between the Earth Sphere Hero mixed team
and the Cavalry Royal Guard Elite team!

name: Announcer
text:
The match will begin as soon as the field preparations are complete,
so please, audience members and live stream viewers,
please wait a little longer!

As the announcer's broadcast ended,
a relaxed mood spread quickly among the heroes in the arena,
who were now on a temporary break.

options.text: ...As expected, His Majesty was still His Majesty.
It must be tough serving this country.
I'm relieved he's still as mischievous as ever.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Your mentality, being able to brush that off as mischievous,
makes me quite worried about you...

name: Ryekie
text:
Isn't that something we shouldn't concern ourselves with?
Since the person himself has given permission,
it would be rude to be overly considerate!

name: Huckle
text:
You can say that because the permission was made public 'now', can't you?
When he appeared on the field without prior notice,
I really broke out in a cold sweat...

name: reXer
text:
—Yo, good work!
I never got to say hello properly,
looking forward to the next battle!

name: Danzo
text:
Nonon, reXer-chan!
It's not good to always act like you're in an e-sports chat, you know?

name: Danzo
text:
When you're with your elders,
you have to make an effort to act like a working adult!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, oh, that's right!
I got lax because I knew them,
I should act more maturely... um.
Thank you for fighting alongside us today.

name: Danzo
text:
OKOK, well, that's a passing grade, right!
So, I came to greet you!
Let's do our best together!
Something like that?

options.text: Oh, it's the two from NeoTalents!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa, [Player]-kuuun!?
Even though I came here to give a polite greeting!
Can you really function as a working adult like that!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, for me, that's the perfect response!
Let's have fun!
Hey, hey!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-What's with that arm-grabbing greeting!?
And you do that right after telling me to be proper!
Ugh!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wh-What kind of emotion is that!?
I mean, I still need a lot of improvement,
but I'm a full-fledged hero now, you know!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Isn't it like, everyone else is a veteran,
and then suddenly you're the only rookie?
Like, 'You've risen in the ranks!'

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-Well, it's not exactly like that.
But, now that you mention it, it's true.
Even though my agency pushed for it, I'm nervous...

name: Huckle
text:
Oh, NeoTalents Production.
Next up is your mixed team with Galaxy Athletes.
Nice to meet you.

name: Ryekie
text:
But I'm surprised!
To think that a budding young hero like reXer would enter
this tournament full of veterans!

name: Danzo
text:
Well, our agency is the organizer, right?
They probably want to boost the buzz by putting in a young talent
who's been getting a lot of attention in battles recently!

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, I'm not saying we're pushing him, though!
Our reXer isn't just a rising star;
he's also rapidly improving his skills!

name: reXer
text:
S-Stop it...!
When you praise me that much,
I just get embarrassed...

name: reXer
text:
Well, I'll do my best to meet your expectations!
Most importantly, let's have fun!

name: Huckle
text:
Mm-hmm, the future of NeoTalents is bright.
It would have been good if we had brought some young heroes from our agency too.

name: Polaris Mask
text:
—Oh, hey, everyone's gathered!
I was really looking forward to this match,
let's make it a good battle!

name: Hydoor
text:
Seems like I'm seeing a lot of familiar faces lately...
Well, even though it's a one-match team,
I'm counting on you all.

options.text: Same here, nice to meet you!
Yay, it's been a while, Polaris!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Polaris Mask
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yo, [Player]!
It's not exactly a tag team, but just knowing I get to fight with you
makes me excited!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Polaris Mask
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whenever you're around, the matches are usually fun,
so I'm counting on you again today, okay?

options.text: Hy-kun, are you in a bad mood?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
S-Stop calling me that!!
I'm not in a bad mood,
well, now I am!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Polaris Mask
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, come on, you should just say it honestly.
You've been fidgeting ever since you heard
[Player] was here, you know.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Y-You bastard, Polaris!!
Don't you dare lie,
I wasn't fidgeting at all!!

name: Polaris Mask
text:
Hmm, so it's these six against the opposing team's six elites, huh?
My arm's itching for a fight.

name: reXer
text:
Even so, the opponents are 'Knights', so they all have weapons.
On our side, more than half are mainly close combat... can we do it?

name: Hydoor
text: Hah, you'd be in trouble if you underestimated our physical prowess!

name: Hydoor
text: We're heroes who flaunt the title of athletes!

name: Polaris Mask
text:
Yeah!
If we overwhelm them with movements that don't care about reach,
then it's ours!

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, that's a strong style of thinking!
Well, in the end, we just have to manage with flexible and decisive actions, right?

name: Ryekie
text:
Hahaha, leave it to me!
I won't lose to anyone in terms of experience!!
Feel free to leave your back to me!!!

name: Huckle
text:
Hmm? Oh, no.
I just received a message,
so I was just checking it.

name: Huckle
text:
You know, earlier Melide-kun went to the infirmary,
accompanied by Exio-san, saying that she felt a little dizzy?

name: Huckle
text:
Well, they're saying she's on her way back.
I'm worried if she's really okay...
Oh, here they come.

name: Exio
text:
—Hey, sorry.
In the end, all I could do was get some motion sickness medicine...

name: Melide
text:
Yes... but thanks to that,
I feel much better.
Sorry for making you worry.

options.text: Did you get sick from something...?

name: Melide
text:
Yes... all day today,
I've felt like I was being swayed.
It doesn't affect my observation much, though.

name: Exio
text:
—It's probably Ether sickness.
Ever since we came to this planet... no.
Especially today, the flow of Ether is strange.

name: Exio
text:
Ah... I see.
Since Ether swirls around you,
your senses in that area might be a little dull.

name: Exio
text:
Right—today, while observing the heroes,
did you feel any sense of discomfort?

At that, [Player] squinted again,
and tried to listen intently.

It's barely noticeable if you don't pay attention...
But faintly, the space seems to waver,
and distorted sounds can be heard.

options.text: Now that you mention it, it does feel a bit strange?
But it's a level you wouldn't notice if you didn't pay attention.

name: Exio
text:
—That's right. Melide's senses are quite keen.
She feels even minor disturbances,
which you might not notice if you didn't pay attention, very strongly.

name: Exio
text:
You know how people who easily get seasick on boats
can still get sick even from just small ripples?
It's a similar feeling.

name: reXer
text:
Oh, now that you mention it...
Our operator also said something about feeling a bit off.

name: Polaris Mask
text:
Mine too.
If the Ether is fluctuating,
does that mean something's happening?

name: Exio
text:
No... something doesn't necessarily happen.
Similar phenomena sometimes occur as a precursor to monsters appearing, but—

name: Exio
text:
It's common for only the precursor to occur and for nothing to appear.
However... I think it's better to keep it in mind,
just in case.

name: Exio
text:
Especially when a large surge occurs—
something bad almost always happens.

options.text: Th-That's a scary thing to say...
Just keep an eye on it, understood.

name: Melide
text:
You shouldn't threaten them so much, Exio-sama.
It's like looking at a cloudy sky and saying it might rain.

name: Melide
text:
It's always better to be cautious...
But at the same time, there's no way to prepare for it.
No matter how the 'Observer' moves—

name: Melide
text:
You can't suppress the surge.
Fortunately, there are many heroes here, so even if
a monster appears, I think we'll manage.

Melide said, as if chiding Exio,
then turned back to [Player].

name: Melide
text:
—[Player]-san.
I'm sorry for leaving the observation of the previous matches to you.

name: Melide
text:
I'll join you from the next match.
...But, well. Given my condition earlier—

name: Melide
text:
Could I ask you to switch places during the interval?
I'll get myself in order then.

name: Melide
text:
—I'm fine.
It happens often, so don't worry.
Thank you.

name: Exio
text:
...You seem to trust everyone a lot
and are quite attached.

name: Exio
text:
Truly...
I hope nothing happens.

Exio muttered to himself.
And then, he glared at the vortex that should have been invisible,
forming in the clear sky.

name: reXer
text:
Daaahryaahhh!!
How about this—how's that!!?

name: Royal Guard Captain
text:
Nonsense, with my sword—
such a slash feels like nothing!!

name: reXer
text:
Tch, you're certainly good...!
But—

name: Danzo
text:
Yeah yeah, your back's exposed, right!?
You shouldn't show your back to a ninja,
that's universal common sense, right!!

name: Royal Guard Captain
text:
What!?
—Guwahh!!

name: Rutilix
text:
Captainnn!?
Ugh, you...!
You've been scurrying around ever since!

name: Alphecca
text:
—What. If I can't catch up with speed,
I'll just overwhelm them with sheer force... 'Salvation'!
Helig Flammerei!!

name: Danzo
text:
Whoa whoa whoa!!!?
A rain of spears, I can't possibly dodge all of this—
Ow, ow, ow, ow!!

name: Rutilix
text:
—There!!
Haaah!!

name: Danzo
text:
Whooaaah!!?
—Phew, to exploit my opening,
you're quite good, aren't you?

name: Rutilix
text: Not yet, I'll return the captain's injury twofold... ohh!?

name: Polaris Mask
text:
Hey hey, don't just focus on one person!
Play with me more, too, huh!?

name: Rutilix
text:
Y-You, from before...!
Damn you, I haven't forgotten the humiliation of being put in a joint lock
in front of a public audience!!

name: Polaris Mask
text:
So you can still move!?
I like those guts!
OK, with that spirit, let's go for another round!!

name: Alphecca
text:
Wait, Rutilix!
...He, how can he run around normally
in that gravitational field...?

name: Alphecca
text:
—He can't do it alone,
I too will...
Whoa!?

name: Hydoor
text:
Oh, White Knight!!
You gotta protect yourself,
or your feet will literally be swept out from under you!!

name: Alphecca
text:
This is... water!?
I see, so you've come to seal my fire power...!

name: Ryekie
text:
Alright, stay like that, Hydoor!
Your Majesty, excuse me—
Full power, discharge!!

name: Huckle
text:
—Hey, you idiot, stop!
Even if it's just an energy body discharge, it's still a watery area...!

name: Hydoor, Ryekie, Alphecca
text: Whoooaaaahhh!!!?

name: Huckle
text:
Ah—
It's as I said it would be.
Honestly...

The first half of the Earth Sphere Hero mixed team versus
the Cavalry Royal Guard Elite team.
The back-and-forth offense and defense, which showed signs of stalemate—

Raised the excitement of the venue
beyond that of the warm-up matches.

name: Melide
text:
—Yeah, the Ether's surge seems to have quieted down a bit.
Maybe I was just worrying too much...?

name: Melide
text:
Thanks for staying with me all this time.
But you can relax and prepare for the second half now.

options.text: I'll take you up on that.

text:
Under circumstances where everyone is being stably observed
by multiple 'Observers'.
The Ether's surge—

As far as [Player] could discern, it seemed to have calmed down.
[Player] took Melide's words to heart.

—Just as they were about to rest a little,
their vision flickered at an astonishing rate.

name: Exio
text:
...! This is...
The Ether suddenly started to get disturbed?
What's about to begin...?

Next, a strong ringing in the ears.
[Player] steadied their wobbly legs
and looked around.

name: NT Co. Operator
text:
Ugh, ah...!
What... my ears...!

name: GA Co. Operator
text:
M-My nose... is twisting...!
My head, it feels like it's going to explode...!

Operators dispatched from each agency
began to suffer one after another.
Not just operators from other agencies...

name: Melide
text:
Ugh...!
No... this.
I can't... control it.

Melide also slumped down,
as if she was collapsing on her knees.

The operators' abnormality doesn't
directly transmit to the heroes.
However—

name: Ryekie
text:
Mmm... what is it?
My Parallel Weapon...?

name: reXer
text:
Huh...?
Something's, crumbling...?

As each operator fell into a state where they can no longer be observed,
noticeable anomalies began to appear in the Parallel Weapons.

options.text: The heroes' transformations will undo in front of everyone!
I have to take over the observation!

text:
[Player] instantly
jumps in front of the kneeling Melide,
and tries to take over her observation—no.

All of them try to intercept the observation of the heroes,
whose observation was about to be interrupted,
to the best of their ability.
Seeing it unfold, Exio suddenly shouted.

name: Exio
text:
—! Stop it!
In this situation, if 'you' take over
the observation...!!

—The next moment.
[Player]'s ears rang even more strongly,
and their vision distorted.

In the center of [Player]'s vision,
the view of the temporary stadium,
a single point became extremely distorted,
and then—a black spot appeared.

The spot instantly turned into a large "hole",
and began to violently suck in its surroundings,
spinning in a vortex.

name: Ryekie
text:
—Ngh!?
This is... agh!!

name: Polaris Mask
text:
What, happened...!?
Uwahh!!

The crumbling battle-field.
The heroes clung to the exposed
base pipes and floor edges.

name: Huckle
text:
—[Player]-kun!
Stop the observation!!
Immediately!!

Huckle, clinging to a steel beam,
shouted loudly.

[Player] tried to stop the observation,
but it wouldn't work.

No matter what they did,
whether closing their eyes or covering their ears...
Their consciousness was steadily pulled towards the direction of the path.

options.text: Something like this, never happened before...!

text:
As they were attempting,
they lost their footing,
were sucked into the path, and then—

They floated up from the ground,
straight towards the path.
Their body was flung in the wind.

Ahead of them was a giant chunk
of the battle arena floor,
which had been sucked out just like them just now.

name: Hydoor
text:
—Watch out!!
[Player]!!

Seeing this, Hydoor, who was clinging to a nearby pipe,
instantly let go and jumped out.

—However,
before he could reach them.

Someone's arm caught them.
[Player] looked up, and there was
Danzo's face.

name: Danzo
text:
...Made it!
Are you alright for now!?

name: Danzo
text:
—Whoa, shoot!
The chain, it's gonna break...!?
What is this, a black hole!?

The chain Danzo had wrapped around the steel beam
was making noises, and about to break.

—Just then,
another chain and anchor flew in,
wrapping themselves around the steel beam.

name: Hydoor
text:
You guys, grab onto my rope!!
You'll get sucked in!!

Hydoor, who was at the end of the rope,
even closer to the center of the "hole",
shouted towards them.

name: Danzo
text:
Th-That helps!!
—But...!

Danzo tried to jump from the chain
he was attached to, to Hydoor's rope.
However—

name: Danzo
text:
Even I—
Can't get enough distance!?

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, wait a sec...!
Whoa!?

Danzo's jumping power lost to the 'hole''s suction,
and so his body drifted away
before he could grab Hydoor's rope.

He barely managed to grab Hydoor's leg,
but—

name: Hydoor
text:
Oh, crap...!?
My rope—

The rope snapped as if it was unraveled.
[Player] and the others fell straight
into the "hole".

The scenery of the world recedes.
Darkness dominates the vision.
The sight of the collapsing stadium fades away.

name: Huckle
text:
[Player]-kun!!
[Player]—

Huckle, clinging to the rubble,
shouting desperately towards them—
the people instantly swallowed by darkness.

Chapter 1:
The Bringer of Strife

—Was it a moment, or several hours?
Or perhaps several days...?
[Player] was trapped in a darkness where all senses were sealed.
[Player] had a memory of that sensation.

options.text: Can we go back, I wonder...?

text:
Just as a vague unease began to sprout within [Player]—
the situation was suddenly broken.

The vision, which had been enveloped in darkness, suddenly changed,
and was engulfed in dazzling light.

Purple to blue, blue to green, green to yellow...
The dazzling flash changed colors rapidly,
and finally became pure white.

—The next moment.
[Player]'s body was in the clear blue sky.

Looking to their right, Danzo was holding them.
Looking around from there...

name: Danzo
text:
—Whoa, whoa.
Where is this...?
An unfamiliar landscape stretched far into the distance.

[Player] and the others were in the middle of falling from a considerable height,
facing strong gusts of wind.

options.text: Where in the world are we!?

name: Danzo
text:
Settle down!
I don't know what's going on either,
but I'll try to make a safe landing first!

name: Danzo
text:
—Wait, huh?
Just the two of us?
I thought...

name: Hydoor
text:
A-Ahhhhhh!!!?
What's going on, what's happening!?
Someone, explain it to meee!!

Turning their gaze towards the voice,
they saw Hydoor clinging desperately to Danzo's right leg
with only his grip strength.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Damn it...!
If it weren't for this situation,
I'd give you a good punch...!!

name: Danzo
text:
...Oh, there you are.
And, aren't you a little late to start making a fuss~?
There was clearly a lag, wasn't there?

name: Hydoor
text:
Shut up!
I was frozen because I couldn't grasp the situation!
Besides, why didn't you notice I was holding your leg!?

name: Danzo
text:
Well, those legs of mine don't have any nerves!
Yeah, I thought it felt a bit heavy, but still~?

name: Danzo
text:
More importantly, are you okay in that state?
It'll probably be a while
until we reach the ground.

name: Hydoor
text:
Of course I'm not okay!!
My hands are already numb from all this wind—
I-I'm falling!!

name: Danzo
text:
Alright, alright, I thought so!
In that case, try your best to climb onto my back,
it'll be a little better then!

name: Danzo
text:
Leave it to me!
I'm not a cyborg ninja for nothing,
this height and number of people is nothing to me!

name: Danzo
text:
...Well.
I haven't had any practical experience though.

name: Hydoor
text:
You haven't!!?...Guaaah—
But it's true I can't do anything by myself...
I'm really counting on you!!

Hydoor somehow managed to climb onto Danzo's body
and cling to his back.

With [Player] in front and Hydoor on his back,
Danzo spun around in mid-air.

name: Danzo
text:
Alright, it's almost time for landing!
Both of you, hold on tight!

—A few moments after the voice called out.
With a sound like a bomb exploding,
Danzo landed on the ground.

They instinctively closed their eyes from the rising dust
and the impact transmitted through their arms.
Afterward, they slowly opened their eyes and...

Danzo stood on the ground, calmly holding [Player]
and carrying Hydoor on his back.

name: Danzo
text:
Alright, alright!
My brain's a little shaken,
but we made it, didn't we!

name: Hydoor
text:
Th-That saved us...!
I'll thank you, but
what's up with your body?
It's too tough...

name: Danzo
text:
Well, it's not just the body's durability,
it's a combination with a bit of martial arts,
but that's a trade secret, so please understand!

name: Danzo
text:
You two can get down now!
We landed so roughly, but nothing happened,
so it's probably not a minefield or anything.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No need to thank me every time, my lord!
Because protecting you is my job!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What kind of relationship do you two have...?
There's a subtle atmosphere that doesn't feel entirely legitimate.

name: Hydoor
text:
Even I, of all people, couldn't do anything
when suddenly thrown into the sky.
Thanks, uh...

name: Danzo
text:
I'm Danzo!
Just a music artist affiliated with NeoTalents, nice to meet you!
And you, uh, is 'Hy-kun' correct?

name: Hydoor
text:
It's H-Y-D-O-O-R!!
Hitomi must have put that idea in your head,
I won't allow that nickname, remember it!!

name: Hydoor
text:
I'm supposedly a swimmer affiliated with Athletes...
Self-introductions aside, where exactly are we?
What happened?

Following Hydoor's lead,
[Player] and Danzo also looked around.

It was a green grassland, far removed
from the wasteland of the Aradisia Kingdom they were in just moments ago.
The undulating terrain was covered with overgrown vegetation—

And in the sky visible through the gaps, the Satellite Band,
a band of light that should exist on most inhabited planets,
was nowhere to be seen.

options.text: It was there in the Aradisia Kingdom...

name: Hydoor
text:
—You're right, that's not there.
By the way, what's that for?
It's usually in every planet we visit.

name: Danzo
text:
I don't know the exact details either,
but I do know it's necessary for streaming
using "LIVE@HERO".

name: Danzo
text:
If it's not there...
Does that mean we're in some incredibly remote place!?
[Player]-kun, do you have any idea?

options.text: This is the first time something like this has happened...

name: Danzo
text:
...I thought so~.
It clearly seemed like a situation beyond [Player]'s control.

name: Danzo
text:
Besides, if you had experienced this before,
you probably wouldn't be here now, [Player].

name: Danzo
text:
Well. I completely relied on my lord for anything related to observation,
so I'm completely clueless when it comes to that knowledge...

name: Danzo
text:
If there's any clue, maybe we can take a shot at guessing!
Hey, what did it feel like when you observed that path?

options.text: Hmm, it was just some ringing in my ears...
It felt the same as when a big monster might appear.
It wasn't much different from the sensation I sometimes encounter on site.

name: Danzo
text:
I see... hmm.
I pride myself on being the exact opposite of a pessimist,
but I can only come up with bad predictions.

name: Danzo
text:
Ah—! I wonder if Grigory-kun or someone
can somehow fix this!
Though the chances are super slim!!

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, hey, hey, I don't get it at all.
You guys, you're not actually
predicting where we are, are you?

name: Danzo
text:
Um... a path is apparently like a hole
that connects to a universe different from ours,
in other words, a parallel universe.

name: Danzo
text:
And well. We actually went to a different universe once
by passing through a man-made path.

name: Danzo
text:
...Right. We, who passed through the path,
might have been blown into a different universe,
different from the one we originally came from.

name: Danzo
text:
That's what I was thinking...
It's still just a prediction though!
I'd rather bet on the possibility that we just warped!

name: Hydoor
text:
Are you serious...?
I heard about other universes when we transformed,
but I didn't think they actually existed...

name: Hydoor
text:
—Hmm?
Hold on.
For someone who's "been there", you look pretty pathetic, don't you?

name: Hydoor
text:
Don't tell me...
you were just helped back by someone else,
and you don't know how to get back yourself?

options.text: I don't even know why we came here...

name: Danzo
text:
Exactly!
We just entered and exited through a prepared door!
And that door broke afterwards, you know?

name: Danzo
text:
So, if we really did travel between universes,
we're pretty much screwed.
We have to find our way back from scratch.
Like, entering hell mode?

name: Hydoor
text:
H-Huh!?
Don't joke around,
you don't have even a millimeter of a clue!?

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, [Player]!
We're gonna search for a way back like our lives depend on it!!
There's no way I'm going to be buried in some place I don't understand!!

name: Danzo
text:
Wait, wait, wait!
It's not confirmed yet!
Let's just look around a bit, unexpectedly...

—Danzo stopped his words,
meant to soothe Hydoor.
From a nearby bush, something stirred.

The source of the sound appeared
before they could even figure out its identity.

name: Monsters
text:
Zuzu, zuzuzu...!
Zuzuzu...!

name: Danzo
text:
Wow, literally adding insult to injury!
Can't you at least come out after we've calmed down!?

name: Hydoor
text:
You think those monsters would understand that!
[Player], prepare for battle!

name: Danzo
text:
Wait, wait!
There's no Satellite Band here, you know!?
I wonder if we can even stream or transform...!

name: Hydoor
text:
We won't know until we try!
Or do you want to keep running away forever!?

name: Danzo
text:
—Sorry, you're right!
Let's just go for it!
[Player]-kun, please!

[Player] tried to observe the two heroes,
with a prayer.

Then, although the sensation was slightly "further" than usual,
they were able to successfully transform the two.

options.text: It felt a little weird, though!

name: Danzo
text:
Oh—, it worked, didn't it!?
If the destination is the same, maybe things
can just work out unexpectedly?

name: Hydoor
text:
Logic doesn't matter!
It's a bit of a disadvantage against monsters,
but I'll take them on even with bare hands!

name: Hydoor
text:
[Player]!
If you can transform us,
you can connect to the live stream too, try it!

options.text: The logic is completely different, though!?
That's the one thing that might not connect...!

name: Danzo
text:
Our ViewPower is limited,
so if we can connect,
it'd be a great help!

Prompted by the two, [Player] activated "LIVE@HERO".
Then—

An undecipherable message was displayed,
and although the screen display was greatly distorted,
it transitioned to the streaming screen.

At the top of the screen, a button was displayed,
which appears when live stream preparation is complete.

options.text: It looks a bit strange, but it seems like it'll work!
As long as it connects, I'm starting the live stream!

name: Hydoor
text:
Alright!!
Come at me, monsters!!

name: Monsters
text: Zuzu, zuzuzu...!
Battle Start

name: Hydoor
text:
—Oraaaahhh!!
This is the end!!

name: Red Slime-type Monster
text:
Zuzu, zuzuzu...
Zuzu....

name: Hydoor
text:
Ngh!? ...Damn it.
The blade chipped again.
Good thing it was the last one...

name: Danzo
text:
Phew, you did it, Hy-kun?
You seemed to have a bit of a hard time fighting,
but you still finished them off.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hmph, you too.
By the way, are you really just a musician?
You're too proficient in martial arts, aren't you?

name: Danzo
text:
Hehe, well, you know~.
...Even so, we had quite a struggle
against opponents we usually wouldn't have trouble with.

Several young monsters.
They were opponents that the two of them, with their abilities,
would have easily handled, but...

Because the ViewPower supply was unstable,
weapons crumbled and transformations almost undid during the battle—

Many problems occurred, and now that the battle is over,
both of their hero suits are in tatters.

options.text: It's tough when the connection isn't stable, after all.
I wonder if there were really any viewers...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, no!
It's not something [Player] should worry about!
It's a miracle the stream connected at all!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah.
Your operation is still easy to work with.
This time, it was entirely a weapon problem.

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm... I wonder if "LIVE@HERO" itself
exists in this world?
There don't seem to be many viewers, though.

name: Hydoor
text:
W-Well... in any case,
it's safer to avoid battles in this place,
that's for sure.
Let's hurry and find a way back—

name: Danzo
text:
—Wait.
Someone's coming.

Danzo cut off Hydoor's words with a low voice.
The three huddled together quietly.

From all directions, slowly.
Many human-sized shadows approached.

Those who appeared were people
who didn't seem armed.
No hostility could be felt in their gaze.

Rather, they surrounded [Player] and the others,
gazing at them with a warm look
that even felt friendly.

name: Hydoor
text:
Wh-What are these guys...?
Are they planning to fight...?

name: Danzo
text:
...From the looks of it,
it doesn't seem like
that's their intention... you know.

Danzo whispered quietly, his hand on his weapon.
The person who stepped forward flinched for a moment
when Danzo deliberately made his weapon clink,
but after thinking for a while, they spread their arms and began to speak.

That person spoke in an unknown language.
Following suit, people from the crowd
started speaking one after another.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Hey.
Do you understand what these guys are saying?
I've never heard this language before.

name: Danzo
text:
I have no idea either...
By the way, if it were a language from a planet affiliated with the Galactic Federation,
my device should automatically translate it.

name: Danzo
text:
Ah, this is basically a technological defeat, you know!?
This means the 'other universe' theory
might be getting stronger, after all~?

options.text: F-For now, let's just tell them we don't understand.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, what are you doing!?
You're talking in our standard language, of course they won't understand you!

name: Danzo
text:
That's right, body language!
Let's put down any obvious weapons and just
convey that we don't understand the language first!

[Player] and the others pointed to their ears,
made X-signs with their arms, and shook their heads,
sending messages with gestures.

At first, the other party kept talking,
but then they started looking at each other,
and began to converse among the crowd as if consulting.

Eventually, the crowd nodded to each other,
and each held a hand to their ear.

The hands the people held to their ears
lit up with a soft glow for a moment.
Then—

name: Resident?
text:
—We are so sorry!
We never imagined the era would be so far apart...!

name: Resident?
text:
—Again, welcome!
People from beyond the 'Rainbow'!

name: Resident?
text:
We have been waiting for people with your kind of power
for a long time!

name: Resident?
text:
To be able to meet you at such a critical moment...
It's truly a miracle,
I don't know how to thank you enough...!

name: Hydoor
text:
H-Hey, hey.
It's good that we can understand them now,
but what's with this overwhelming welcome?

name: Danzo
text:
I-I don't know, but...
At least they don't seem hostile.
Is 'Rainbow' referring to the path?

options.text: I certainly felt a rainbow-colored light.

text:
Then, the people who had stepped forward first
raised both hands above their heads and approached,
maintaining a pose indicating they had no weapons.

The people who came closer
pointed to the arms where [Player] and the others
were wearing their devices.

name: Resident?
text:
—Could you lend us that?
We won't do anything strange.

options.text: What are they going to do with the device...?

text:
[Player] and the others exchanged glances.
But they held out their devices to the people as instructed.

The people held their hands over [Player]'s devices.
—Then.

As before, their hands glowed for a moment.
When they moved their hands away,
two new apps had been added to the device screen.

One had an icon shaped like a dictionary.
The other had an icon shaped like a camera.

name: Resident?
text:
The model was unfamiliar, but...
I'm glad it seems we were able to register it.

name: Resident?
text:
With this, you too will be able to converse with us,
and you won't have trouble fighting.

name: Danzo
text:
Whoa! My device is protected by super-tight security~!
But it was easily bypassed!

name: Hydoor
text:
What are these guys, some kind of hacker group?
If what they're saying is true,
it doesn't seem like a bad app, though...

[Player] tapped each app to check.
Nothing happened when they tapped the dictionary one, but—

When they tapped the camera icon,
an interface very similar to the "LIVE@HERO" streaming screen
was displayed.

options.text: Is this a live stream app for this place?
Indeed, it doesn't seem like a strange app.

name: Resident?
text:
Our 'King' would be able to provide you a detailed explanation.
Please, come to our 'Royal Palace'!

name: Resident?
text:
Our 'King' is also looking forward to meeting you!
Now, this way!

name: Hydoor
text:
Oh, right!?
Who's this 'King,' and don't push!
We haven't said we're going yet!

name: Danzo
text:
At least, the other side seems to be technically superior to us,
so it might be better not to resist unnecessarily?

name: Danzo
text:
Well... we don't have any other plans right now, do we?
Maybe we should just listen to what they have to say?
There might be a clue to getting back.

options.text: I hope we don't get involved in trouble...

text:
[Player] and the others,
prompted, began to walk, surrounded by the crowd.

Ahead of them, beyond the grassland—
a castle-like building,
somewhat familiar, began to appear.
